name: Waifu
additional_notices:
The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en:
Waifu ® is an anime-themed entertainment token of the
Binance Smart Chain ecosystem. No Waifu... No Laifu!
A decentralized premium cryptocurrency for anime lovers and
otaku. A solid crypto-currency that was built on a top
blockchain's smart contract. A BEP-20 token on the binance
smart chain!
It also has a provably fair and transparent initial coin
distribution, which we believe are critical for the long-term
success and decentralization.
